There are 5 types of csgo players:
1. The rager that complains about every keystroke you make
2. The 200iq smurf you will meet in every match
3. The cheater(just, what are you doing with life)
4. The spammer(doesnt know how to play the game but is insane with Negev)
5. Flexer, no matter what skin you like, this guy has it

If I am forgetting anyone, feel free to share more!
